comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

If you load a webpage with frames, the window resize gripper normally present as a content overlay, does not show.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Make sure the add-on bar is off.
2. Load a page with frames

Actual Results:  
Gripper isn't present

Expected Results:  
Gripper should always be present.
comments.author: mark@wolfbeast.com
comments.creator: mark@wolfbeast.com

comments.raw_text: While a regression, I don't think this blocks. We can fix it in a security/stability update. Would definitely consider a safe patch if it materializes before Fx4 gets out the door though.
